channel.title: Comments on: Renovation catchup, with pictures!
channel.description: A miscellany of know-it-all-isms by Geoff Sowrey

item.title: By: Geoff
item.dc:creator: Geoff
item.description: At least I'm not bitching about it as badly as when I took the deck apart at the old house. That was far worse. Far, far worse. This is actually fun, and also validating -- it's proving that I <em>can</em> do something useful! The joys of having to schedule the contractors ain't so fun, but at least it gives me someone to yell at when things aren't going as planned. ;)
item.content:encoded:
At least I’m not bitching about it as badly as when I took the deck apart at the old house. That was far worse. Far, far worse.
This is actually fun, and also validating — it’s proving that I can do something useful!
The joys of having to schedule the contractors ain’t so fun, but at least it gives me someone to yell at when things aren’t going as planned. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Tom
item.dc:creator: Tom
item.description: Oh come on, you can't tell me you're not having fun :)
item.content:encoded: Oh come on, you can’t tell me you’re not having fun ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Geoff
item.dc:creator: Geoff
item.description: Well, I gotta set up all the basic electrical (and plan some of the lighting), getting the air ducting re-installed, and insert the insulation before that. Lots of work left. Lots and lots of it.
item.content:encoded:
Well, I gotta set up all the basic electrical (and plan some of the lighting), getting the air ducting re-installed, and insert the insulation before that.
Lots of work left. Lots and lots of it.

item.title: By: andre
item.dc:creator: andre
item.description: looks like it's coming along... once the dry wall goes up i'm sure it'll feel way different..
item.content:encoded: looks like it’s coming along… once the dry wall goes up i’m sure it’ll feel way different..
